column5: Soooo, who is gonna be out there catching the first fish of the new year??? Make sure you know the regs as some rivers change on the 1st.  I'm gonna be fishing the mouth of the Beaver.  Anyone there come say hi and stay for the champagne.....just kidding....
i am for sure prob,from a few shore spots that i have,prob for walleyes,
I'm hoping to sleep in (although the kids will have something to say about that...quite early and loudly I'm sure).  I have zero fishing plans on the horizon until we see some ice.

my bud and myself are fishing new years day in a 12ft,aluminum with an electric motor on the back,since there is no ice we figured might as well use the little boat    who would of thought on jan 1st we would be out in a boat on scugog

Fishing? Yes, I suppose you could call it fishing. The Impaler and I are going on our yearly ritual on New Years Day. We go to a nearby conservation area where they lower the water by 8 - 10ft. Then we hit the stump fields looking for snagged lures. After replacing the hooks and split rings, they are ready to go. These lures are already lucky, because we found them and they're free, so our confidence in them is high.

Well i was contemplating on hitting a lake up north with the tinny this weekend. Just gonna keep an eye on the weather and if it stays fair thats where i will be headed tommorow or sunday as long as i am not up all night at the OFC swill......lol. I plan on fishing right through the whole weekend.

Picked up my license on Friday so I am good to go if the weather looks promising. I hope to be fishing the rivers that are still open for a couple of hours before I have to work in the afternoon. If it is raining I will just have to wait till the 3rd to head out...
my wife and my self will be on kempenfelt bay in the boat looking for whitefish ,been doing this for all most 15 years do to the lack of ice every year.
I think fishing is not in my plans iam going to be partying all night haha. So i think i will be sleeping in.  Happy new year to everyone.   jordan
holy moly my plans have changed, will be getting out for the first time since the niagara (lack of) musky g2g
